titleNepali: SEE २०८१ अनिवार्य गणित अभ्यास परीक्षा ५ (७५ पूर्णाङ्क)

context.Nepali: १०० जना विद्यार्थीहरूको सर्वेक्षणमा, ६० जनाले दूध र ५० जनाले दही मन पराउँछन् । १० जनाले दुवैमध्ये कुनै पनि मन पराउँदैनन् ।
context.English: In a survey of 100 students, 60 like milk and 50 like curd. 10 students like neither of them.

sub_questions.questionNepali: कम्तीमा एउटा परिकार मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the number of students who like at least one item?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कम्तीमा एउटा परिकार मन पराउने विद्यार्थीहरूको संख्या ($n(M \cup C)$) निकाल्न, जम्मा विद्यार्थी संख्या ($n(U)$) बाट कुनै पनि मन नपराउने विद्यार्थी संख्या ($n(\overline{M \cup C})$) घटाउनुपर्छ । तसर्थ, $100 - 10 = 90$ जना विद्यार्थीले कम्तीमा एउटा परिकार मन पराउँछन् ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the number of students who like at least one item, which is represented by the union of the sets ($n(M \cup C)$), subtract the number of students who like neither ($n(\overline{M \cup C})$) from the total number of students ($n(U)$). Calculation: $100 - 10 = 90$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: दुवै परिकार मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of students who like both items.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
दुवै परिकार मन पराउने विद्यार्थीहरूको संख्या ($n(M \cap C)$) निकाल्न समूहको सूत्र प्रयोग गर्दा: $n(M \cup C) = n(M) + n(C) - n(M \cap C)$ । मानहरू राख्दा: $90 = 60 + 50 - n(M \cap C)$ । हल गर्दा: $n(M \cap C) = 110 - 90 = 20$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Use the set formula for the union of two sets: $n(M \cup C) = n(M) + n(C) - n(M \cap C)$. Substitute the known values: $90 = 60 + 50 - n(M \cap C)$. Solving for the intersection gives $n(M \cap C) = 110 - 90 = 20$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: दूध मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of students who like milk only.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
दूध मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थीहरूको संख्या ($n_0(M)$) निकाल्न, दूध मन पराउने जम्मा संख्याबाट दुवै परिकार मन पराउने संख्या घटाउनुपर्छ । $n_0(M) = n(M) - n(M \cap C) = 60 - 20 = 40$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the number of students who like only milk ($n_0(M)$), subtract the number of students who like both items from the total number who like milk. Calculation: $n_0(M) = 60 - 20 = 40$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: दही मात्र मन पराउने र दूध मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको अनुपात निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the ratio of students liking curd only to milk only.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिले दही मात्र मन पराउने संख्या निकालौँ: $n_0(C) = n(C) - n(M \cap C) = 50 - 20 = 30$ । दूध मात्र मन पराउने संख्या ४० छ । अनुपात $30 : 40$ हुन्छ, जसलाई सरल गर्दा $3 : 4$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, calculate the number of students who like curd only: $n_0(C) = 50 - 20 = 30$. We already know milk only is 40. The ratio is $30 : 40$, which simplifies to $3 : 4$.
Citation: Lesson 1

context.Nepali: रु. २०,००० को २ वर्षको लागि १०% वार्षिक ब्याजदरमा:
context.English: For Rs. 20,000 at 10% annual interest for 2 years:

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the annual compound interest.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the annual compound interest formula $CI = P[(1 + R/100)^T - 1]$: Substitute the values to get $20000[(1.1)^2 - 1]$. Simplifying gives $20000(0.21)$, which equals Rs. 4,200.
Citation: Lesson 2

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the semi-annual compound interest.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
For semi-annual interest, use the formula $CI = P[(1 + R/200)^{2T} - 1]$. Substituting values: $20000[(1 + 0.05)^4 - 1]$. Since $1.05^4 \approx 1.215506$, the interest is $20000 \times 0.215506 \approx 4310.13$.
Citation: Lesson 2

sub_questions.questionNepali: अर्ध-वार्षिक ब्याज वार्षिक ब्याज भन्दा कतिले बढी छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: By how much is the semi-annual interest more than the annual interest?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अर्ध-वार्षिक ब्याज र वार्षिक ब्याजको अन्तर निकाल्न घटाउनुहोस्: रु ४३१०.१३ - रु ४२०० = रु ११०.१३ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Subtract the annual interest from the semi-annual interest to find the difference: Rs. 4310.13 - Rs. 4200 = Rs. 110.13.
Citation: Lesson 2

context.Nepali: एउटा सहरको जनसङ्ख्या १,००,००० छ र वार्षिक वृद्धिदर १०% छ ।
context.English: A city has population 1,00,000 and annual growth rate 10%.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: What will be the population after 2 years?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the population growth formula $P_T = P(1 + R/100)^T$: $100000(1 + 0.1)^2 = 100000(1.21) = 1,21,000$.
Citation: Lesson 3

sub_questions.questionEnglish: How much population was added in 2 years?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
थपिएको जनसङ्ख्या निकाल्न २ वर्षपछिको जनसङ्ख्याबाट सुरुको जनसङ्ख्या घटाउनुपर्छ । $1,21,000 - 1,00,000 = 21,000$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the added population, subtract the initial population from the population after 2 years: $1,21,000 - 1,00,000 = 21,000$.
Citation: Lesson 3

context.Nepali: विनिमय दर: १ अमेरिकी डलर = ने.रु. १३० छ ।

sub_questions.questionNepali: ने.रु. २६,००० सँग कति डलर साट्न सकिन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How many dollars can be exchanged with NRs. 26,000?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
डलर किन्नका लागि ने.रु. लाई विनिमय दरले भाग गर्नुपर्छ: $26000 / 130 = 200$ डलर ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To convert Nepali Rupees to Dollars, divide the amount by the exchange rate: $26000 / 130 = 200$ Dollars.
Citation: Lesson 4

sub_questions.questionNepali: यदि नेपाली रुपैयाँ १०% ले अधिमूल्यन भयो भने, ने.रु. २६,००० ले कति डलर साट्न सकिएला ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: If Nepali rupee is revalued by 10%, how many dollars can be exchanged with NRs. 26,000?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अधिमूल्यन (Revaluation) ले डलरको विनिमय दर घटाउँछ । नयाँ दर = $130 - (130 \text{ को } 10\%) = 130 - 13 = 117$ । अब साट्न सकिने डलर = $26000 / 117 \approx 222.22$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Revaluation means the Nepali currency becomes stronger, so the exchange rate decreases. New Rate = $130 - 10\% = 117$. The new amount of dollars = $26000 / 117 \approx 222.22$.
Citation: Lesson 4

context.Nepali: एउटा वर्ग आधार भएको पिरामिडको आधारको भुजा १० से.मि. र छड्के उचाइ १३ से.मि. छ ।
context.English: A square-based pyramid has base side 10 cm and slant height 13 cm.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the area of the base.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
वर्गाकार आधारको क्षेत्रफल $A = a^2$ हुन्छ । यहाँ भुजा $a = 10$ भएकाले $A = 10^2 = 100$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The base is a square, so Area $A = a^2$. Given $a = 10$, Area = $10 \times 10 = 100$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the vertical height.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
ठाडो उचाइ ($h$) निकाल्न पाइथागोरस साध्य प्रयोग गरिन्छ: $h = \sqrt{l^2 - (a/2)^2}$ । यहाँ $l=13$ र $a/2=5$ छ । $h = \sqrt{13^2 - 5^2} = \sqrt{169 - 25} = \sqrt{144} = 12$ से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the Pythagorean theorem for the vertical height $h$: $h = \sqrt{l^2 - (a/2)^2}$. Substituting $l=13$ and $a/2=5$: $h = \sqrt{169 - 25} = \sqrt{144} = 12$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the volume of the pyramid.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पिरामिडको आयतनको सूत्र $V = \frac{1}{3} Ah$ हो । मान राख्दा: $V = \frac{1}{3} \times 100 \times 12 = 100 \times 4 = 400$ घन से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The volume formula is $V = \frac{1}{3} Ah$. Calculating: $V = \frac{1}{3} \times 100 \times 12 = 400$ cm³.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: ६ से.मि., ८ से.मि. र १० से.मि. अर्धव्यास भएका तीनवटा धातुका गोला पगालेर एउटा ठुलो गोला बनाइयो ।
context.English: Three metallic spheres of radii 6 cm, 8 cm, and 10 cm are melted to form a single large sphere.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the total volume of all three spheres.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The total volume is the sum of the volumes of the three spheres: $V = \frac{4}{3}\pi (6^3 + 8^3 + 10^3) = \frac{4}{3}\pi (1728) = 2304\pi$ cm³.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: नयाँ ठुलो गोलाको अर्धव्यास पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the radius of the new large sphere.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
ठुलो गोलाको आयतन $\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3$ कुल आयतन $2304\pi$ सँग बराबर हुन्छ । $\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3 = \frac{4}{3}\pi (1728)$ । दुवै तर्फबाट $\frac{4}{3}\pi$ हटाउँदा $R^3 = 1728$ हुन्छ । १७२८ को घनमूल १२ हो, त्यसैले $R = 12$ से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Set the volume of the large sphere equal to the total volume: $\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3 = \frac{4}{3}\pi (1728)$. Simplifying gives $R^3 = 1728$. The cube root of 1728 is 12, so the radius $R = 12$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the surface area of the new sphere.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
सतहको क्षेत्रफल निकाल्ने सूत्र $A = 4\pi R^2$ हो । $R=12$ राख्दा: $A = 4\pi (12)^2 = 4\pi (144) = 576\pi$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the surface area formula $A = 4\pi R^2$ with $R=12$: $A = 4\pi (144) = 576\pi$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: एउटा कोठाको लम्बाइ ५ मि., चौडाइ ४ मि. र उचाइ ३ मि. छ । यसमा जम्मा १० वर्ग मि. क्षेत्रफल भएका झ्याल र ढोका छन् ।
context.English: A room is 5m x 4m x 3m. It has windows and doors with total area 10 sq. m.

sub_questions.questionNepali: झ्याल र ढोका बाहेक भित्ताको क्षेत्रफल निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the area of walls excluding windows and doors.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिले चार भित्ताको क्षेत्रफल निकाल्नुहोस्: $2h(l+b) = 2(3)(5+4) = 6(9) = 54$ वर्ग मि. । अब झ्याल र ढोकाको क्षेत्रफल घटाउनुहोस्: $54 - 10 = 44$ वर्ग मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Calculate the gross area of the four walls: $2h(l+b) = 2(3)(9) = 54$ sq. m. Subtract the area of openings (10 sq. m) to get the net area: $54 - 10 = 44$ sq. m.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: प्रति वर्ग मि. रु. ५० का दरले रङ लगाउन कति खर्च लाग्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the cost of painting at Rs. 50 per sq. m.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कुल खर्च = क्षेत्रफल $\times$ दर । ४४ वर्ग मि. लाई रु. ५० ले गुणन गर्दा: $44 \times 50 = 2200$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Total Cost = Net Area $\times$ Rate. $44 \times 50 = 2200$.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: n औं पद निकाल्ने सूत्र लेख्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the formula for nth term.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अंकगणितीय श्रेणीको n औं पदको सूत्र $t_n = a + (n-1)d$ हो ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The formula for the nth term is $t_n = a + (n-1)d$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the 10th term.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Here $a=5$ and $d=5$. Substituting into the formula: $t_{10} = 5 + 9(5) = 50$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the sum of the first 10 terms.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the sum formula $S_n = \frac{n}{2}(a+l)$: $S_{10} = 5(5 + 50) = 275$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the type of equation.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
यो वर्ग समीकरण (Quadratic Equation) हो ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
This is a Quadratic Equation.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the values of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
खण्डीकरण गर्दा: $x^2 - 5x - 3x + 15 = 0 \Rightarrow (x-5)(x-3) = 0$ । त्यसैले $x$ को मान ३ र ५ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Factorizing: $(x-5)(x-3) = 0$. Thus, $x = 3, 5$.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Verify the answer.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substituting $x=3$: $9 - 24 + 15 = 0$. Substituting $x=5$: $25 - 40 + 15 = 0$. Both verified.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Simplify the equation.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Factor out $5^x$: $5^x(5 + 1) = 150 \Rightarrow 6 \cdot 5^x = 150$.
Citation: Lesson 9

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the value of x.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$5^x = 25$. Since $25 = 5^2$, $x = 2$.
Citation: Lesson 9

context.Nepali: एउटा समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको क्षेत्रफल १०० वर्ग से.मि. छ । एउटै आधारमा बनेको त्रिभुज ABE छ ।
context.English: A parallelogram has area 100 sq. cm. Triangle ABE stands on the same base.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the area relationship.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
एउटै आधार र उही समानान्तर रेखाहरू बिच बनेको त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको क्षेत्रफलको आधा हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The area of a triangle on the same base and between the same parallels is half the area of the parallelogram.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find area of triangle ABE.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल = $100 / 2 = 50$ वर्ग से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Triangle Area = $100 / 2 = 50$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.Nepali: चक्रीय चतुर्भुज ABCD मा $\angle A = 2x$ र $\angle C = 3x$ छ ।
context.English: In cyclic quadrilateral ABCD, $\angle A = 2x$ and $\angle C = 3x$.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the property of cyclic quadrilateral.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
सम्मुख कोणहरूको योगफल १८० डिग्री हुन्छ (सम्पूरक हुन्छन्) ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Opposite angles sum to 180 degrees (supplementary).
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$2x + 3x = 180 \Rightarrow 5x = 180 \Rightarrow x = 36$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$5x = 180 \Rightarrow x = 36$.
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find measure of $\angle A$.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\angle A = 2x = 2 \times 36 = 72^\circ$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$\angle A = 2(36) = 72^\circ$.
Citation: Lesson 12

context.Nepali: एउटा समबाहु त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल $16\sqrt{3}$ वर्ग से.मि. छ ।
context.English: The area of an equilateral triangle is $16\sqrt{3}$ sq. cm.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the area formula.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
समबाहु त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Area formula is $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2$.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the side length.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$16\sqrt{3} = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2 \Rightarrow a^2 = 64 \Rightarrow a = 8$ से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Solving $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2 = 16\sqrt{3}$ gives $a^2 = 64$, so $a = 8$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the perimeter.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
परिमिति = $3a = 3 \times 8 = 24$ से.मि. ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Perimeter = $3a = 24$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.Nepali: एउटा टावरको उचाइ ३० मि. छ । ३० मि. टाढाबाट हेर्दा:
context.English: A tower is 30m high. Observed from 30m away:

sub_questions.questionNepali: उन्नतांश कोण कति हुन्छ ? (शब्दमा वर्णन गर्नुहोस्)
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the angle of elevation? (Describe)
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\tan \theta = \frac{30}{30} = 1$ । $\tan 45^\circ = 1$, त्यसैले कोण $45^\circ$ हुन्छ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$\tan \theta = 1$, so the angle is $45^\circ$.
Citation: Lesson 15

sub_questions.questionNepali: यदि कोण $30^\circ$ बनाउनु छ भने कति टाढा जानुपर्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How far to move for $30^\circ$ angle?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
New distance $d = 30\sqrt{3} \approx 51.96$. Must move $21.96$ m further.
Citation: Lesson 15

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write median formula.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
व्यक्तिगत श्रेणीको मध्यिका = $\frac{N+1}{2}$ औं पद ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Median position is $(N+1)/2$-th item.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate Q1.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
तथ्याङ्क क्रमबद्ध गर्दा, $Q_1 = \frac{11+1}{4} = 3$rd पद = १२ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Sorted data: 10, 11, 12... $Q_1$ is 3rd item = 12.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate Quartile Deviation.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$Q_3 = 9$th पद = २२ । चतुर्थांश विचलन = $\frac{22 - 12}{2} = 5$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
$Q_3 = 22$. Quartile Deviation = $(22-12)/2 = 5$.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: List the sample space outcomes.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कुल ८ परिणामहरू: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT} ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The 8 outcomes are {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}.
Citation: Lesson 14
sub_questions.answerNepali: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}
sub_questions.answerEnglish: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}

sub_questions.questionNepali: कम्तीमा २ टाउको आउने सम्भाव्यता कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Probability of at least 2 heads.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कम्तीमा २ टाउको हुने ४ वटा घटना छन् ({HHH, HHT, HTH, THH})। सम्भाव्यता = $4/8 = 1/2$ ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Favorable outcomes (at least 2 H) are 4. Probability = $4/8 = 1/2$.
Citation: Lesson 14
